title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 15 - Migrant Farmworker Housing
content:

State Regulations

General Provisions (§ 15.1 to 15.4)

Standards (§ 15.5 to 15.9)

Food Protection and Garbage and Refuse Disposal (§ 15.10 to 15.11)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. I, pt. 15

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §225

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
